verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When all my labors and trials are o'er, And I am safe on that beautiful shore, Just to be near the dear Lord I adore Will through the ages be glory for me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When by the gift of His infinite grace, I am accorded in heaven a place, Just to be there and to look on His face, Will through the ages be glory for me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
